sourcesContent: import{jsxs as t,Fragment as i,jsx as n}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{translate as e}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{useAuthenticator as o}from"../hooks/useAuthenticator/index.js";import{Button as r}from"../../../primitives/Button/Button.js";import{Flex as s}from"../../../primitives/Flex/Flex.js";const m=m=>{const{cancelButtonSendType:c,cancelButtonText:a,submitButtonText:l}=m,{_send:u,isPending:p}=o((t=>[t.isPending])),d=p?t(i,{children:[e("Submitting"),"…"]}):n(i,{children:e("Submit")}),b=l||d;return t(s,Object.assign({direction:"column"},{children:[n(r,Object.assign({fontWeight:"normal",variation:"primary",isDisabled:p,type:"submit"},{children:b})),n(r,Object.assign({onClick:()=>u({type:c}),type:"button",variation:"link",fontWeight:"normal",size:"small"},{children:a}))]}))};export{m as TwoButtonSubmitFooter};
